overview: Bijan Marashi is Xoopit’s Co-Founder & CEO, overseeing product strategy, marketing, and sales. Prior to Xoopit, Bijan consulted the executive teams at European portals including Telecom Italia and Gruppo Espresso on product strategy. Bijan was also a lead product manager for Inktomi’s Search & Directory Engines. Prior to Inktomi, Bijan was a product manager for Spry’s Internet-In-A-Box product. He cut his teeth on the Windows 3.1/Windows 95 Networking teams at Microsoft.
